review: Works great. Streams my Galaxy S5 perfectly. Setup was quick and painless
author: Brett Emanuelson

review: I love this thing. I use it everyday. I recently purchased a second one for the kids room.
author: Anthony

review: Great for streaming plex. Easy setup and I can move it from room to room when required with very little effort.
author: Shannon G "Shannon Graver"

review: We have one for every TV! Love it because it is inexpensive compared to apple TV, works better in my opinion too because we can stream from ANY device in our house. We have alien laptop, dell laptop, hp lap top, android phone, android tablet and an ipad. We can stream from any device in our home. It is so convenient and also a money saver. we have netflix so we stream movies from there and we don't have to purchase cable.
author: Nathan Giere

review: Use it all day every day.  If you are tech-savvy in the slightest, then you NEED one of these things in your home.  They also make great gifts.
author: D M

review: This thing worked twice and has since completely crapped out. We have reset it at least 30 times and each time it craps out again. It's not worth it.
author: Ramy Badie
